title: codehtcmail
author: codehtcmail
content: I am looking to sell some game accounts with some rare collectibles on them, but don't seem to find a place that pays me with crypto, I've seen some that accept crypto (USDT) as a payment for buyers but not as a payout option for the sellers.For info I am mainly looking to sell a Mobile Legend MLBB account with all heroes, max emblem, 412+ skins, all magic chess commanders, all magic chess starlight since start, all starlight since december 2019... valued at $1200+ at some auction sites.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Have you looked into Playerup[1]? They seem to accept Bitcoin as a payment method. There's also Epicnpc but I'm not sure if they have an automatic middleman system like Playerup.Alternatively, you can try to sell the account in the "Invites & accounts" board here on the forums.[1] https://www.playerup.com/support-tickets/knowledge-base/middleman-seller-payment-methods.22/

comments.author: codehtcmail
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on January 23, 2023, 05:50:17 PMHave you looked into Playerup[1]? They seem to accept Bitcoin as a payment method. There's also Epicnpc but I'm not sure if they have an automatic middleman system like Playerup.Alternatively, you can try to sell the account in the "Invites & accounts" board here on the forums.[1] https://www.playerup.com/support-tickets/knowledge-base/middleman-seller-payment-methods.22/Thanks man, never heard of playerup before.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Well, the forum has its own marketplace in Digital goods[1] and its sub-board[2], you can sell there. Mention your price, payment options, etc. Buyer might ask for escrow for security purposes, so you should consider it.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=93.0[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=234.0

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: One of the biggest online game markets communities is definitely Sythe.org; though it mostly caters to the likes of RuneScape, Steam games, etc. You can at least try posting under the Other Games section though.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on January 23, 2023, 06:07:39 PMQuote from: OmegaStarScream on January 23, 2023, 05:50:17 PMHave you looked into Playerup[1]? They seem to accept Bitcoin as a payment method. There's also Epicnpc but I'm not sure if they have an automatic middleman system like Playerup.Alternatively, you can try to sell the account in the "Invites & accounts" board here on the forums.[1] https://www.playerup.com/support-tickets/knowledge-base/middleman-seller-payment-methods.22/Thanks man, never heard of playerup before.Here's a link, a thread listing store.https://www.epicnpc.com/threads/mobile-legends-adventure-accounts-listing-store-thread.2205267/Binance or Coinbase exchanges are their most recommended for other payment methods. For Playerup, here's a link.https://www.playerup.com/accounts/mobilelegendsaccount

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on January 23, 2023, 06:07:39 PMQuote from: OmegaStarScream on January 23, 2023, 05:50:17 PMHave you looked into Playerup[1]? They seem to accept Bitcoin as a payment method. There's also Epicnpc but I'm not sure if they have an automatic middleman system like Playerup.Alternatively, you can try to sell the account in the "Invites & accounts" board here on the forums.[1] https://www.playerup.com/support-tickets/knowledge-base/middleman-seller-payment-methods.22/Thanks man, never heard of playerup before.Playerup.com is one of the best sites for me that I have worked for years in selling game accounts such as Clash of Clans, Clash Royale, Counter-Strike, Minecraft Accounts, and many others, or ways to increase followers and subscribers to social media accounts in exchange for crypto as well, as it is multiple payment methods, so you can pay by credit card Or PayPal and others, and when withdrawing your money as well. What distinguishes the Playerup site is that it enjoys high credibility and plays the role of mediator in transactions between the seller and the buyer so that no fraud occurs.Also, the G2G.com site is well-known and fully supports crypto, and transactions are carried out in a secure manner between buyers and sellers. Check out the link below to find all the questions you have in mind.[1] https://support.g2g.com/support/solutions

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: You can use SellDefi.com to upload your digital products and then sell in Digital Goods topic on BitcoinTalk or Invites and Accounts by posting links of your products. Make sure to add proper description and price for your products. You can include multiple files at once and also set a limit to sell like Sell product to only 1 Person.By the way I am owner of SellDefi platform and you can read more about us on our ANN Thread.

comments.author: Tabani Pierson
comments.body: One popular platform for buying and selling game accounts is PlayerAuctions.com. Upon checking their website, it seems they do not support USDT as a payout option for sellers.I hope this information is helpful in your search for a platform to sell your Mobile Legend MLBB account.
